{{ record.periodEnd }} {{ record.type }} {{ record.paymentType }} {{ record.caseId }} {{ record.originalAmt }} {{ record.osPrin }} {{ record.osInt }} {{ record.osAmt }} {{ record.letter }} No records found. import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-overpayment-tab', templateUrl: './nsman-overpayment-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-overpayment-tab.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanOverpaymentTabComponent implements OnInit { displayRefundHistoryDialog: any = { display: false }; displayInterestComputationDialog: any = { display: false }; displayRefundDetailsDialog: any = { display: false }; sampleData = [ { discoveryDate: "10-10-2021", payee: "S1234567J", periodStart: "20-08-2021", periodEnd: "29-09-2021", type: "CHANGE IN TRAINING PERIOD", paymentType: "FLEXI-ICT", caseId: "S21-1024", originalAmt: "123.45", osPrin: "123.45", osInt: "5.00", osAmt: "128.45", letter: "10-11-2021"}, { discoveryDate: "10-10-2021", payee: "S1234567J", periodStart: "20-07-2021", periodEnd: "29-08-2021", type: "CHANGE IN SERVICE PAY", paymentType: "FLEXI-ICT", caseId: "S21-1023", originalAmt: "234.56", osPrin: "234.56", osInt: "5.00", osAmt: "239.56", letter: "10-11-2021"}, { discoveryDate: "10-10-2021", payee: "S1234567J", periodStart: "20-06-2021", periodEnd: "29-07-2021", type: "CHANGE IN AWARDS/ALLOWANCE", paymentType: "FLEXI-ICT", caseId: "S21-1022", originalAmt: "345.67", osPrin: "345.67", osInt: "5.00", osAmt: "350.67", letter: "10-11-2021"}, { discoveryDate: "10-10-2021", payee: "S1234567J", periodStart: "20-05-2021", periodEnd: "29-06-2021", type: "CHANGE IN MUP (NA ADJUSTMENTS)", paymentType: "FLEXI-ICT", caseId: "S21-1021", originalAmt: "0.00", osPrin: "0.00", osInt: "0.00", osAmt: "0.00", letter: "10-11-2021"} ] constructor() { // to do } ngOnInit(): void { // to do } exportCSV(): void { // to do } onOpen(dialog: any): void { dialog.display = true; } }
